page.title: 05THE PARISH CHURCH,LLANGOLLEN
page.content: The{church}is the oldest institution in Llangollen.It was founded by{Saint {Collen}who was a{6th century}celtic saint.In the 13th century a stone church was built along side Collen's original cell,and throughout the centuries additions and improvements have been made.There are about{200 regular members of the church, and in addition to the normal church services the church welcomes many visitors.The {church choir}has 30 members who meet every Friday evening to practise. They take part in Sunday Services and are often asked to sing at weddings and occasionally at funerals. The most interesting and beautiful feature of the ancient church is the fine medieval{carved oak ceiling.}Many people also come to see the tomb of {Lady Eleanor Butler}and{Sarah Ponsonby who lived at{Plas Newydd.
